about_the_game:
Synopsis
Los Infernales is a platform game, with runner elements, about the story of the “infernales”, a militia of brave warriors, who repelled the royalist invasions in northern Argentina during the independence period.

The key features are:
A) Original mechanics: It’s like a platform game with runner elements.
B) Simple mechanics and controls but with very versatile gameplay. You're going to have fun quickly.
C) You are a militia, so you’ll fight until the last infernal falls. You must to care your team because each of the living militia warriors are your lifes
D) It’s based on a true story and the mystique of the infernals, a militia that faced the veterans of the Napoleonic wars.

The game will have:
•Single player and local multiplayer modes
•6 types of heroes with different weapons/abilities
•Heach level will represent a real battle

The pixel art style is inspired in fine art history

content_descriptors.notes: War scenes and melee fighting. Bloody fight
